# isExcludedFromWindowsMenu

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the window is excluded from the application’s Windows menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isExcludedFromWindowsMenu: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the window is excluded from the Windows menu; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. The default initial setting is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: isExcludedFromWindowsMenu
